# Body

**Associated Type**

The type of widget that represents the content of the bundle.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Body : Widget
```

## Discussion

When you support more than one widget, Swift infers this type from your implementation of the required [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WidgetBundle/body-swift.property] property.

## Implementing a widget bundle

- **body**: Declares the group of widgets that an app supports.
- **WidgetBundleBuilder**: A custom attribute that constructs a widget bundle’s body.
